item.title: Report E-2025010037
item.description:
Report E-2025010037

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-18
  • City: HAZLETON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Pitt Ohio Express
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon arrival at the destination terminal, the pail was discovered leaking inside the trailer. The pails on the skid were secured using a dunnage pallet but during transit, the dunnage pallet moved slightly, allowing the pail to fall off of the skid it was sitting on. As a result, the bottom of the pail cracked causing a small release of material. The material was absorbed using absorbent material and placed into a proper receptable along with the damaged pail for proper disposal. The package specifications were not able to be safely obtained.

item.title: Report E-2024120440
item.description:
Report E-2024120440

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-27
  • City: CARLISLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0411 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal BCA. It was reported that approximately 2.5 gallons of Retail Cip Oven Cleaner was released from a 2.5-gallon plastic jug due to improper loading by terminal XVL. The release impacted two boxes with the jug only in trailer #3119301. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. Only the boxes were affected and oil dri may be used if needed. Called Chemtrec and spoke to Chris. Report #2024112700014. 222656-1 â€“ 20-gallon DF contains four 2.5-gallon plastic jugs of Retail Cip Oven Cleaner, the two boxes, PPE, and oil dri.
